64 /* Header file guard bands */
65 #ifndef ICCCONFIG_h
66 #define ICCCONFIG_h
67 
68 //Define the following to use namespace
69 //#define USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
70 
71 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
72 namespace sampleICC {
73 #endif
74 
75 //PC, visual C++
76 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(__MWERKS__) && (defined(_M_IX86) || defined(_M_X64) || defined(__amd64__))
77 
78  //Define how 64 bit integers are represented
79  #define ICCUINT64 unsigned __int64
80  #define ICCINT64 __int64
81  #define ICUINT64TYPE unsigned __int64
82  #define ICINT64TYPE __int64
83 
84  #define ICCUINT32 unsigned long
85  #define ICCINT32 long
86  #define ICUINT32TYPE unsigned long
87  #define ICINT32TYPE long
88 
89  #define USE_WINDOWS_MB_SUPPORT
90  #define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN // Exclude rarely-used stuff from Windows headers
91  //#include <windows.h> //For Multibyte Translation Support
92 
93  #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
94 
95  #if defined(ICCPROFLIBDLL_EXPORTS)
96  #define ICCPROFLIB_API _declspec(dllexport)
97  #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN
98  #elif defined(ICCPROFLIBDLL_IMPORTS)
99  #define ICCPROFLIB_API _declspec(dllimport)
100  #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN extern
101  #else //just a regular lib
102  #define ICCPROFLIB_API
103  #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN
104  #endif
105 
106  //Since msvc doesn't support cbrtf use pow instead
107  #define ICC_CBRTF(v) pow((double)(v), 1.0/3.0)
108 
109  #if (_MSC_VER < 1300)
110  #define ICC_UNSUPPORTED_TAG_DICT
111  #endif
112 
113 #else // non-PC, perhaps Mac, Linux, or Solaris
114 
115  #define ICCUINT64 unsigned long long
116  #define ICCINT64 long long
117  #define ICUINT64TYPE unsigned long long
118  #define ICINT64TYPE long long
119 
120  #include <stdint.h>
121 
122  //Make sure that 32 bit values are set correctly
123  #define ICCUINT32 uint32_t
124  #define ICCINT32 int32_t
125  #define ICUINT32TYPE uint32_t
126  #define ICINT32TYPE int32_t
127 
128  #if defined(__APPLE__)
129  #if defined(__LITTLE_ENDIAN__)
130  #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
131  #else
132  #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_BIG_ENDIAN
133  #endif
134 
135  #else // Sun Solaris or Linux
136  #if defined(__sun__)
137  #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_BIG_ENDIAN
138  #else
139  #define ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
140  #endif
141  #endif
142 
143  #define ICCPROFLIB_API
144  #define ICCPROFLIB_EXTERN
145  #define stricmp strcasecmp
146 
147  //Define ICC_CBRTF as a call to cbrtf (replace with pow if system doesn't support cbrtf)
148  #define ICC_CBRTF(v) cbrtf(v)
149 
150  #define ICC_WCHAR_32BIT
151 
152  #define ICC_ENUM_CONVENIENCE
153 
154 #endif
155 
156 // remove comment below if you want LAB to XYZ conversions to not clip negative XYZ values
157 #define SAMPLEICC_NOCLIPLABTOXYZ

159 #ifdef SAMPLEICCCMM_EXPORTS
160 #define MAKE_A_DLL

164 #define SAMPLEICCEXPORT __declspec( dllexport)
165 #else
